abstract: Baseball Roundup; Pittsburgh Pirates defeat Chicago Cubs, 3-2; other MLB scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Winning their seventh straight victory, Pittsburgh increased its lead for the National League’s top wild-card spot to four and a half games over the Cubs.

headline.main: Pirates Win, Forcing Cubs to Put Off Playoff Party
headline.print_headline: Pirates’ Victory Forces Cubs to Put Off Their Playoff Party

snippet: Winning their seventh straight victory, Pittsburgh increased its lead for the National League’s top wild-card spot to four and a half games over the Cubs.
